title: godoc doesn't display "Indexing in progress" any more
body:
If you start godoc and try to search for something immediately you'll get no results
back. Wait a little while for the index to be built, and you'll get results. Previously
one would receive a "Indexing in progress" message, but that's no longer the
case. Can we have it back?

Looking at the code I noticed that it was a non-trivial change, so I'm filing this issue
so it doesn't get forgotten about.
